name: NEW (OFF Fangame)
description:
Here to download the game? Download NEW for free using the green "Download" button at the bottom. Disclaimer: Playing OFF first is highly advised!... But not necessary.

And now... the description (ooo)...

Fight through hordes of monsters and ugly people to meet a cat and save the world in the unofficial sequel to OFF's story:
NEW... now in its Complete & Definitive Form!

Plot

Taking place directly after the The Batter pulls the switch, the world is seemingly reset. The Player is told in simple terms that "bad people got in, get rid of them." The Batter, now christened as a Prophet, embarks on a quest to save the world from malicious, never before seen forces.

Featuring
  • Various difficulty settings, make the game easy or hard.
  • 100 Unique enemies! ...What? There's only 99 in the folders? ha ha ha...
  • A life changing experience! You will physically age as you play!
  • Hazard-proof stairs... Go through them properly!
  • The cast you all know and love: Discarded and replaced by superior [redacted].
  • A combat system that
  • Creature designs faithful to the art style of Mortis Ghost's originals.
  • Not 1, not 2, not 3, not 4, not 5.... how many cats are there...?
  • ...
  • ...New Game+!?
